page.title: 07Trout Farm 2:The Deverills
page.content: The{Trout Farm}rears{Canadian Rainbow {Trout,}a variety which grow very rapidly and are thought by many to be a finer flavour table trout. They are amenable to living in the relatively confined conditions of the fish tank, they are also disease free, another important factor in fish farming. Eleven people work at the Trout Farm on a shift rota for someone must be there seven days a week to feed the trout.Most of the trout are bred at the farm though a proportion are raised at the hatchery at the {Bishopstrow Trout Farm.}The fish are fed on pellets graded according to their size, small fry are fed several times a day, larger trout twice a day. The largest trout they have raised is 12lbs but the preferred size for smoking is 5lbs. The most popular size for the table is 3/4lb.
